name: Saci aprisionou o diabo na garrafa
description:
"Saci imprisoned the devil in the bottle"

October 31 is celebrated the National Saci Day in Brazil.

Saci is a character from Brazilian folkloric history and has African and indigenous cultural references.

Among several folkloric legends, the character of the Saci is a very naughty boy who does not have one leg and jumps with only one leg. He wears a red cap and red clothes, distrusts animals, steals food, plays tricks on people, and loves to scare the nearby community.
